thread.section_title: Words Anywhere Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Words Anywhere | www.wordsanywhere.com
thread.title: Debbie

author: Debbie
title: Debbie
text:
My main concern was how easy would the vinyl go onto the wall. I have bought several pieces in various stores and it has always been hit and miss... But not this time! My vinyl order arrived fast, was SUPER EASY to apply and it looks beautiful! I love it!
From now on I will order from Words Anywhere - and bonus - I don't have to settle for just what a store has - I can have any letters/words/font/size I want!
